title: Essendo Morti - Being Dead
description: Nominated for the 2010 Griffin Prize in Poetry, introducing award winning author Jéanpaul Ferro's full-length collection of selected poems; Essendo Morti- Being Dead, written in the post 911/world of the September 11th terrorist attacks. This collection looks at the heart-breaking ideals of an America that only the dead know now.
author: Jéanpaul Ferro
